com.ash.util

Class StringFormatCheck

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ash.util.StringFormatCheck

  • public class StringFormatCheck
extends java.lang.Object
    Custon string format supplier.
    Valid formatting:
    '@': any letter or number
    '§': only letters
    '$': only numbers
